text: I don't know how I lived so long without this stuff. This brand is leaps and bounds superior to all the other coconut oils out there. It has comparatively little greasiness on the skin and absorbs quite fast. I use it as a moisturizer, shaving cream, makeup remover, hair conditioner, scar treatment, to relive itching on bug bites, lube (no latex condoms though please), foot treatment at night, massage oil, and I even use it on my pet hedgehog for his dry skin. It has  great texture and faint coconut smell that is pleasing and not overpowering. I don't regularly eat it or use it to cook with, but I have tasted it and it is nearly flavorless. I recommend this to nearly every person I talk to.
